content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, undrained" )

content.text: 0) In a saucepan, bring applesauce to a boil.
1) Remove from the heat; stir in gelatin until dissolved.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Remove"@3:9 / AC
		:source ( "the heat"@15:23 / OTHER )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "stir in"@25:32 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "gelatin"@33:40 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until dissolved"@41:56 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "add"@10:13 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "soda"@14:18 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "pineapple"@23:32 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
